SEARCH:
Package game

Klasse Deck

java.lang.Object
game.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represents a deck of playing cards. The deck can be either a standard 52-card deck or a 32-card deck.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    Deck(boolean isStandardDeck)
    Constructs a new deck of cards with a specified size.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Methode

    containsCard(Card otherCard)
    Checks if the deck contains a specific card, used for testing purposes.

    Gets the cards in the deck.
    int
    getSize()
    Gets the size of the deck.
    void
    printDeck()
    Prints the cards in the deck for testing purposes.
    void
    shuffle()
    Shuffles the deck using the Fisher-Yates Shuffle algorithm.

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Deck

      public Deck(boolean isStandardDeck)
      Constructs a new deck of cards with a specified size.
      Parameter:
      isStandardDeck - If true, creates a standard deck of 52 cards; if false, creates a deck of 32 cards.

  • Methodendetails

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffles the deck using the Fisher-Yates Shuffle algorithm.

    • printDeck

      public void printDeck()
      Prints the cards in the deck for testing purposes.

    • containsCard

      public boolean containsCard(Card otherCard)
      Checks if the deck contains a specific card, used for testing purposes.
      Parameter:
      otherCard - The card to check for in the deck.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the deck contains the specified card, false otherwise.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Gets the size of the deck.
      Gibt zurück:
      The size of the deck.

    • getCards

      public Card[] getCards()
      Gets the cards in the deck.
      Gibt zurück:
      An array containing copies of the cards in the deck.
